alert.note: Alert for Henderson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 8:45PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Vanderburgh, east central Posey and north central Henderson Counties through 815 PM CDT... At 744 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Blairsville, or 9 miles northeast of Mount Vernon, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Kasson around 750 PM CDT. This includes Interstate 69 in Indiana between Mile Markers 1 and 2. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for southwestern Indiana...and northwestern Kentucky.
